participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, creative, and family-oriented. Enjoys artistic pursuits and has a nurturing side.
participant_1.background: I need to balance my work and family life. I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew. I have been known to fall off my cosplay costume. grandma makes jewelry. I am in my early 30s and identify as female.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Curious, laid-back, and artistic. Enjoys quiet time and exploring their identity through various interests.
participant_2.background: I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me. I love discovering new things about myself! I have shot a lion. I like to draw.

content.text: Hi! Hope your day is going well
Hey! It's going pretty good, thanks for asking!
What have you been up to?
Not much, just doing some laundry and making some art.
Nice! I'm in my early 30s and identify as female, what about you?
Cool, I'm 29 and identify as non-binary.
Oh, that's cool! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love to draw, play video games, and go to concerts.
I love to draw too! What kind of art do you like to make?
I like to draw cartoons and anime.
Nice! I love cartoons. What's your favorite one?
I love Steven Universe, Adventure Time, and Gravity Falls.
Those are all great shows! I love Steven Universe too.
Have you seen the new season yet?
No, I haven't had time yet. I'm hoping to watch it soon.
I hope you enjoy it! It's really good.
